response: "datenprivatsphäre? was ist das noch mal? 🤔 in zeitalter von facebook, google & co. wird unsere persönliche information seem to be more and more worthless. 💰📈 why should we care about data privacy when everyone else seems to don't give a damn? 🤷‍♂️😕 #datenprivatsphäre #datenschutz #privatsphäre"
